participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Maya loves exploring new cultures and has a strong passion for learning languages.
participant_1.background: My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK. I haven't gone home in over two years. I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family. I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings. I like to watch Japanese cartoons anime in my free time.

participant_2.name: Evan
participant_2.personality: Evan is reflective and nurturing, often seeking ways to help others while pursuing his own personal growth.
participant_2.background: I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential. I'm a pretty peaceful person, but I can hold my own if I need to. I love learning about the geology of the Grand Canyon and sharing my knowledge with visitors. I work as a freelance accountant. My black and white cat, Cow, is my most valued material possession because he is my best friend and always there for me.

content.text: Hello! I'm just taking a break from studying. How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing well today, thank you for asking. What are you studying?
I'm studying Japanese. I'm trying to learn as much as I can before I go to Japan next year.
That's awesome! Japan is a beautiful country. I've always wanted to go there.
It's definitely on my bucket list. I'm so excited to travel there!
I bet! What are you most looking forward to about your trip?
I'm looking forward to seeing all of the amazing temples and shrines. I'm also really excited to try the food!
The food is delicious! I'm sure you'll love it.
I'm sure I will! I'm also excited to meet the people and learn about their culture.
I think you're going to have a great time. Japan is a wonderful place to visit.
Thank you! I'm really looking forward to it.
